Greeting_Morning:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Let's see... What would be a good lunch
today? <sp:5:0:0>Everyone relies on my cooking to
get them through the day, after all...
Greeting_Rain:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>On rainy days like this, it's really
important for me to cook the perfect
meals for everyone.
Greeting_Evening:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Hm... What would be good for breakfast
tomorrow, I wonder?

Breakfast helps everyone wake up in the
morning, so it needs to be good...
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Oh, I haven't seen you before, I don't
think... Are you here because you've
heard about me?
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Well, it's all trueâ€”I'm the one in charge of
keeping the members of the researching
team healthy and happy.
And I've figured out the secret to keeping
them energized. Want to know what it is?
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Ha, of course you do! <sp:5:0:0>And I'll tell you!


It's all about what they eat!


<sp:3:0:2:0100>When it's hot outside, you should cook up
meals using chillshrooms. When it's cold,
substitute sunshrooms instead!
It's amazing how well the body can hold
up to high or low temperatures if you've
used the right ingredients.
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS>Well, want to try it for yourself? I'm sure
you do! Feel free to use this pot.
AssassinEquipment_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I have to say...


<sp:3:0:2:0900>Dressing like that to scare me isn't very
nice. You should put effort into thinking of
others if you want to be a good cook.
Greeting_EarlyMorning:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Hmm. What would be a good breakfast
today? <sp:5:0:0>I want everyone to start the day
off right, after all...
Greeting_Noon:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal_00>What should I make everyone for dinner?<sp:5:0:0>
They're all looking forward to the meal, so
I can't disappoint them...
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Be careful if you head to Gerudo Canyon.
It's not a welcoming environment and will
almost certainly tax your endurance.
If you ask me, the best way to prepare is
to bring plenty of good food with you!
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>Have you forgotten the secret I shared
with you? Oh, what am I going to do
with you...
I can tell you again, since I'm so helpful
and all. Want to hear it?
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh, it's you! <sp:5:1:0>Thanks to you, I was able to
safely come back here.

I really can't thank you enough.


<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh!<sp:5:1:0> I have a secret trick I use to keep the
researchers here healthy and energized.
Maybe I could share that with you?
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Want to know the secret?
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>Oh!<sp:5:0:0> Are you interested after all?


Do you want me to share the secret to
keeping everyone energized?
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>For you to wake me up out of a deep,
restful sleep... Do you miss my cooking so
much that you can't wait until morning?
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Sleep is as important as eating well, you
know. Everyone needs to sleep away the
fatigue of the day before.
How about we chat in the morning.<sp:5:1:0>
Good night...
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think>It's important to get a good night's rest.<sp:5:1:0>
Good night...
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Awww, did Guspar and Livo really say
such nice things about my cooking?

<sp:3:0:2:0101>Well, I do my absolute best to pick the
perfect ingredients for each meal. It
makes sense they would love the results!
Thanks for sharing that with me.
